original: apply (true_in_reachable_reqs _ _ _ _ I); intros. - apply inductive_invariant_true_in_reachable with (step := step_dup) (init := sequence_sane) (P := fun net => forall p, In p (nwPackets net) -> tmNum (pBody p) < tdNum (nwState net (pSrc p))). + intros. destruct H0; subst. * inversion H1; subst; auto. * apply H in H1; auto. + apply step_dup_sind. * intros. eapply StepDup_deliver; eauto. * intros. eapply StepDup_input; eauto. - apply (true_in_reachable_elim _ _ _ _ I).
